name: White
description:
White is a fast-paced, wave-based hack and slash combat game set in a stark monochrome plane. You take control of an unnamed hero as they battle their way through progressively more challenging levels. With its intuitive and easy-to-learn combat system, unique visuals and punchy combat, White is a satisfying fighter experience.

Gamepad control is supported across most devices, works best with Xbox controller.

Controls:
A or (A) - Jump
S or (X) - Attack
D or (B) - Dash
Arrow keys / Dpad / Left stick - Move
Escape - Save and Exit
